#labels Featured
The realease numbering scheme is a mixture of the targeted Ansys version, e. g. 13.0 and the mode version, e. g. .1 => Ansys mode version 13.0.1

===Installation:===

*Version 13.0.1 & 12.0.1:* Please have a look at the Emacs Wiki (http://www.emacswiki.org/emacs/AnsysMode) or the accompanying README file.

*Version 11.0.2:* Please read the instructions in the source file 'ansys-mode.el'.
